abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews performance by Mariinsky Ballet at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: After wrapping up a Chopin weekend at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, the Mariinsky Ballet is bringing a program of late-19th- and early-20th-century choreography to the Kennedy Center.
snippet: After wrapping up a Chopin weekend at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, the Mariinsky Ballet is bringing a program of late-19th- and early-20th-century choreography to the Kennedy Center.

headline.main: Tweaking an Illustrious Tradition to Incorporate Western Notions
headline.seo: Mariinsky Ballet Concludes Brooklyn Run With Chopin
headline.print_headline: Tweaking an Illustrious Tradition to Incorporate Western Notions
